name: Whiz Racer
description:
Whiz Racer is a car racing game with a twist. The cars are brain powered! Prove that you have the smarts to defeat Professor E by  solving math problems. You will be facing challengers from all over the world through 10 levels of addition, subtraction, multiplication and division.

Become the ultimate Whiz Racer by mastering each level because to defeat Professor E you will have to be smart and fast! 

Features:
5 different tracks to race
8 unique challengers including the math genius, Professor E
Best Time saved for each level
8 paint jobs available to choose from
Progress is saved automatically to allow for casual play

Gameplay:
Solve each math question as quickly as possible
Correct answers add power to your car making it go faster
Click on bonuses and coins to add more speed or slow down your opponents
